mapper.select: SELECT sid, sname, gender, birth, profession, faculty, s_class, grade, phone, politics_status, address, head_url FROM student;
SELECT sid, sname, gender, birth, profession, faculty, s_class, grade, phone, politics_status, address, head_url FROM student WHERE sid = #{sid};
SELECT sid, sname, gender, birth, profession, faculty, s_class, grade, phone, politics_status, address, head_url FROM student WHERE sname LIKE '%${name}%';
mapper.update: UPDATE student SET sname = #{sname}, gender = #{gender}, birth = #{birth}, profession = #{profession}, faculty = #{faculty}, s_class = #{s_class}, grade = #{grade}, phone = #{phone}, politics_status = #{politics_status}, address = #{address}, head_url = #{head_url} WHERE sid = #{sid};
